whyItWorked: The all-inclusive nature of the package, covering lodging, golf, transportation, and meals, provided a seamless and luxurious experience. The use of private homes, including a dedicated 'Party House', and a full-size motorcoach for all transfers, enhanced group cohesion and convenience. Including prize funds and initial house stocking added significant value and a celebratory atmosphere.
